context: Regional bank with 50 branches, $2B assets, facing declining branch traffic and increasing fintech competition

request.purpose: Digital banking platform overhaul including mobile app redesign, API modernization, and AI-powered customer service
request.justification: Market share erosion to digital-first competitors, 40% decline in branch transactions over 3 years

decision_process.outcome: Approved for pilot phase with reduced scope
Successful pilot with 35% increase in digital engagement
Full implementation approved with phased approach

business_impact.expected_digital_adoption: 60% of customers using digital channels within 18 months
